Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The task breaks into three parts, focusing on analyzing resolution times. First, spot cases where resolution takes significantly longer than usual. Second, investigate root causes like escalations or delays before investigation. Third, consider factors such as long waiting times impacting overall duration.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Resolution time is measured from ticket receipt to closure, covering all case events. Example cases show varying durations: Case 101 (2h 15m), Case 102 (~25h), Case 103 (1h 20m), Case 104 (~24h), Case 105 (~49h).

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Cases 102, 104, and 105 stand out with durations of ~25h, ~24h, and ~49h, respectively.
